bibl.note: Document similar to P. Gen. II, 111 (although not exactly a questionnaire), to be produced by a candidate for entering the ephebate (eiskrisis), before, during or after the examination. Alexandria, II AD.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 435-440, 1 pl. coul.
